alert.note: Alert for Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 1:42PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Monterey County through 215 PM PST... At 142 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lucia, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lucia, Gorda and Colman Canyon. This includes Highway 1 between Mile Markers 14 and 15, and between Mile Markers 19 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio
